basics.name: Maciej Kasprzyk
basics.label: DevOps & Software Developer
basics.summary: Experienced DevOps & Software Developer focused on developing services, managing infrastructure as code, cloud computing and deployment processes

work.summary: Helping data freaks with things beyond DevOps horizon

Developing data pipelines with Apache Spark, Kafka, Airflow and many more
Managing multi-cloud infrastructure with AWS and Azure
Developing tools for various purposes like a migration of terabytes of data
Developing CI/CD pipelines
Taking care about code quality with SonarQube
Many, many more
Migrating obsolete build system to google GN
